problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AE bisects ∠BAD, if CE = N_0, AB = N_1, then the perimeter of ▱ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD=BC=10,AB=DC,AD∥BC,∴∠DAE=∠BEA,∵AE平分∠BCD,∴∠BAE=∠DAE,∴∠BEA=∠BAE,∴BE=AB=4cm,∴BC=BE+CE=7cm,∴▱ABCD的周长=2(DC+BC)=2(4+7)=22cm；故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质、等腰三角形的判定、平行线的性质；熟练掌握平行四边形的性质,证出BE=AB是解决问题的关键．
